title: COLD DRIVE - Killer (unofficial release) EP (2008)
description:
COLD DRIVE - Killer (unofficial release) EP (2008)

Name: Cold Drive
Title: Killer (unofficial release) EP
Style: dark electro, EBM
Country: Mexico/USA
Label: self-released
Year: 2008
Format: Mp3 CBR 128kbps

TRACKLIST:
01. Time to Break
02. Killer (original version)
03. Eternal Fire
04. Infection
05. Silent Storm
06. The Unspoken
07. Machines Don&#039;t Die
08. Killer (reaping version)

"From the deepest symphony of a dying cry, and the greatest self-god theory, borns the feeling to breed a creature, not made of flesh but noise and sound, named "Cold Drive" due to the angry, mercyless, fearless, intolerant, free, and cold-hearted way of manufacture the social enviroment. in the year 2005 started with the brilliant idea of the zombified mind of Jess Acevedo. influenced by artists like Wumpscut, Hocico, Suicide Commando, Feindflug, psyclon nine, sero overdose, terrorfakt, assemblage 23, minerve, aslan faction, tactical sekt, dawn of ashes and icon of coil. gave born to the brutality in music..." (c) Cold Drive ZombieFriends
